name: test_e2e_with_logs[040_SQLI_ERR_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERR_001` |
| **Name** | MySQL EXTRACTVALUE error-based |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `EXTRACTVALUE(1,CONCAT(0x7e,version()))`
- **Encoded**: `EXTRACTVALUE(1%2CCONCAT(0x7e%2Cversion()))`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~44000ms
- **Timestamp**: 06:21:19.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERR_001-1768198879434-mbdxo4 pattern_id=SQLI_ERR_001 uri=/?q=EXTRACTVALUE(1%2CCONCAT(0x7e%2Cversion())) client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
